resources.string: NFC unlocks are enabled by default. Tap the reader with the phone. The reader should blink red or green depending on the access rights of the user. If nothing happens, please check that the data in the \'Login\' object in \'KisiUserSessionStorage\' is updated with the data you received from our API.

Motion Sense unlocks are not enabled by default; you need to enable some permissions first. Enable permissions listed below and turn \"Motion Sense State\" switch on. If all permissions are granted and Motion Sense is enabled you should see a notification corresponding to the Motion Sense service. Read top-level README file for more details.
